_source.text: 20 defenses of his WBO title with wins over Jeff Lacy (who is better than Hagler), Chris Eubank (who is better than Hearns), Robin Reid (who is better than Benitez), Peter Manfredo Jr (who is better than Duran), Mario Veit, Omar Sheika, and Charles Brewer...
